attributes.action: Make PAT Testing a legal requirement at work.  Failure would be against law.
attributes.additional_details: What is PAT testing?  See all information here:  www.pat-testing.info
attributes.background: Some businesses don't have PAT Testing done at all as currently it cannot be enforced.  This puts the company and their staff at risk of electrocution or the cause of fires.  This would assist insurance companies.    Also the same could apply to domestic situations too promoting safety in the home.
